text: On Sunday, JAY - Z was joined at the Grammy Awards by his wife Beyoncé and their daughter Blue Ivy. After Camila Cabello performed with Kesha, she made a moving speech about her Cuban roots. In response, Beyoncé and JAY - Z clapped, with the cameras capturing Blue Ivy gesturing toward her famous parents with her hands, apparently urging them to stop clapping while Camila was speaking. Many took to Twitter to share their reaction to Blue Ivy taking charge, with one writing, “ Blue really told Beyoncé and Jay Z to calm down. ” Another wrote, “ THIS VIDEO BLUE TELLING BEYONCE AND JAY - Z TO STOP CLAPPING SO SHE COULD LISTEN TO CAMILA TAL
